016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.providers.CalculatedConfigurationProvider;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.providers.EnvironmentVariablesConfigurationProvider;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.providers.SystemPropertiesConfigurationProvider;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.spi.ConfigurationProvider;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonMerger;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.Resources;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
026import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.javaprop.JavaPropsMapper;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.yaml.YAMLMapper;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.status.StatusLogger;
032
033import java.io.*;
034import java.net.URL;
035import java.util.ServiceLoader;
036import java.util.function.Consumer;
037
038public class StandardConfigurationBuilder {
039
040    private static final ConfigurationLogger logger = ConfigurationLogger.getLogger();
041
042    private static final YAMLMapper yamlMapper = new YAMLMapper();
043    private static final JavaPropsMapper javaPropsMapper = new JavaPropsMapper();
044
045    public StandardConfigurationBuilder() {
046    }
047
048    public void addDefaults(Configuration.Builder builder)
049            throws UncheckedIOException {
050
051        addXorceryDefaults(builder);
052        addExtensions(builder);
053        addApplication(builder);
054
055        addHome(builder);
056        addUserDirectory(builder);
057
058        addConfigurationProviders(builder);
059    }
060
061
062    public void addTestDefaults(Configuration.Builder builder)
063            throws UncheckedIOException {
064
065        // First add the standard configuration
066        addXorceryDefaults(builder);
067        addExtensions(builder);
068        addApplication(builder);
069
070        // Then add the test configuration on top
071        addXorceryTestDefaults(builder);
072        addExtensionsTest(builder);
073        addApplicationTest(builder);
074
075        addConfigurationProviders(builder);
076    }
077
078    public Consumer<Configuration.Builder> addTestDefaultsWithYaml(String yamlString)
079            throws UncheckedIOException {
080        return builder ->
081        {
082            addTestDefaults(builder);
083
084            addYaml(yamlString).accept(builder);
085        };
086    }
087
088    public void addConfigurationProviders(Configuration.Builder builder) {
089
090        ServiceLoader<ConfigurationProvider> load = ServiceLoader.load(ConfigurationProvider.class);
091        for (ConfigurationProvider configurationProvider : load) {
092            builder.add(configurationProvider.getNamespace(), new ConfigurationProviderContainerNode(configurationProvider));
093            logger.log("Added "+configurationProvider.getNamespace()+" configuration provider");
094        }
095    }
096
097    public void addXorceryDefaults(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
098        // Load Xorcery defaults
099        URL resource = Resources.getResource("META-INF/xorcery-defaults.yaml")
100                .orElseThrow(() -> new UncheckedIOException(new IOException("Resource not found: META-INF/xorcery-defaults.yaml")));
101        try (InputStream in = resource.openStream()) {
102            addYaml(in).accept(builder);
103            logger.log("Loaded " + resource);
104        } catch (IOException ex) {
105            throw new UncheckedIOException(ex);
106        }
107    }
108
109    public void addExtensions(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
110        // Load extensions
111        for (URL resource : Resources.getResources("META-INF/xorcery.yaml")) {
112            try (InputStream configurationStream = resource.openStream()) {
113                addYaml(configurationStream).accept(builder);
114                logger.log("Loaded " + resource);
115            } catch (IOException ex) {
116                throw new UncheckedIOException("Error loading configuration file:" + resource.toExternalForm(), ex);
117            } catch (UncheckedIOException ex) {
118                throw new UncheckedIOException("Error loading configuration file:" + resource.toExternalForm(), ex.getCause());
119            }
120        }
121    }
122
123    public void addExtensionsTest(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
124        // Load extensions
125        try {
126            for (URL resource : Resources.getResources("META-INF/xorcery-test.yaml")) {
127                try (InputStream configurationStream = resource.openStream()) {
128                    addYaml(configurationStream).accept(builder);
129                    logger.log("Loaded " + resource);
130                }
131            }
132        } catch (IOException e) {
133            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
134        }
135    }
136
137    public void addApplication(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
138        // Load application config file
139        try {
140            for (URL resource : Resources.getResources("xorcery.yaml")) {
141                try (InputStream configurationStream = resource.openStream()) {
142                    addYaml(configurationStream).accept(builder);
143                    logger.log("Loaded " + resource);
144                }
145            }
146        } catch (IOException e) {
147            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
148        }
149    }
150
151    public void addApplicationTest(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
152        // Load application config file
153        try {
154            for (URL resource : Resources.getResources("xorcery-test.yaml")) {
155                try (InputStream configurationStream = resource.openStream()) {
156                    addYaml(configurationStream).accept(builder);
157                    logger.log("Loaded " + resource);
158                }
159            }
160        } catch (IOException e) {
161            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
162        }
163    }
164
165    public void addHome(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
166        // Load user home overrides
167        try {
168            File userYamlFile = new File(System.getProperty("user.home"), ".xorcery/xorcery.yaml");
169            if (userYamlFile.exists()) {
170                FileInputStream userYamlStream = new FileInputStream(userYamlFile);
171                addYaml(userYamlStream).accept(builder);
172                logger.log("Loaded " + userYamlFile);
173            }
174        } catch (IOException e) {
175            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
176        }
177    }
178
179    public void addUserDirectory(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
180        // Load user directory overrides
181        try {
182            File overridesYamlFile = new File(System.getProperty("user.dir"), "xorcery.yaml");
183            if (overridesYamlFile.exists()) {
184                FileInputStream overridesYamlStream = new FileInputStream(overridesYamlFile);
185                addYaml(overridesYamlStream).accept(builder);
186                logger.log("Loaded " + overridesYamlFile);
187            }
188        } catch (IOException e) {
189            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
190        }
191    }
192
193    public Consumer<Configuration.Builder> addFile(File configFile) {
194        return builder ->
195        {
196            // Load specified overrides
197            if (configFile != null) {
198                try {
199                    if (configFile.getName().endsWith("yaml") || configFile.getName().endsWith("yml")) {
200                        addYaml(new FileInputStream(configFile)).accept(builder);
201                        logger.log("Loaded " + configFile);
202                    } else if (configFile.getName().endsWith("properties")) {
203                        addProperties(new FileInputStream(configFile)).accept(builder);
204                        logger.log("Loaded " + configFile);
205                    } else {
206                        logger.log("Unknown configuration filetype: " + configFile);
207                    }
208                } catch (IOException e) {
209                    throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
210                }
211            }
212        };
213    }
214
215    public void addXorceryTestDefaults(Configuration.Builder builder) throws UncheckedIOException {
216        // Load Xorcery defaults
217        Resources.getResource("META-INF/xorcery-defaults-test.yaml").ifPresent(resource ->
218        {
219            try (InputStream in = resource.openStream()) {
220                addYaml(in).accept(builder);
221                logger.log("Loaded " + resource);
222            } catch (IOException e) {
223                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
224            }
225        });
226    }
227
228    public Consumer<Configuration.Builder> addYaml(InputStream yamlStream) throws UncheckedIOException {
229        return builder ->
230        {
231            try (yamlStream) {
232                JsonNode jsonNode = yamlMapper.readTree(yamlStream);
233                if (jsonNode instanceof ObjectNode on)
234                {
235                    new JsonMerger().merge(builder.builder(), on);
236                }
237            } catch (IOException ex) {
238                throw new UncheckedIOException(ex);
239            }
240        };
241    }
242
243    public Consumer<Configuration.Builder> addYaml(String yamlString) throws UncheckedIOException {
244        return builder ->
245        {
246            try {
247                ObjectNode yaml = (ObjectNode) yamlMapper.readTree(yamlString);
248                new JsonMerger().merge(builder.builder(), yaml);
249            } catch (IOException e) {
250                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
251            }
252        };
253    }
254
255    public Consumer<Configuration.Builder> addProperties(InputStream propertiesStream) throws UncheckedIOException {
256        return builder ->
257        {
258            try (propertiesStream) {
259                ObjectNode properties = (ObjectNode) javaPropsMapper.readTree(propertiesStream);
260                new JsonMerger().merge(builder.builder(), properties);
261            } catch (IOException ex) {
262                throw new UncheckedIOException(ex);
263            }
264        };
265    }
266
267    public Consumer<Configuration.Builder> addProperties(String propertiesString) throws UncheckedIOException {
268        return builder ->
269        {
270            try {
271                ObjectNode properties = (ObjectNode) javaPropsMapper.readTree(propertiesString);
272                new JsonMerger().merge(builder.builder(), properties);
273            } catch (IOException e) {
274                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
275            }
276        };
277    }
278}
